channel.title: Tools on Presidium
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on Presidium

item.title: Link Validation
item.description: This tool reports links within a Presidium site. You can use this tool see which links are broken, points to non standard protocols. The tool does not need a live Presidium site to work against, so the site does not need to be deployed. How to use the tool Generate a local public site by running presidium hugo: presidium hugo Next run the tool pointing to the public site: presidium report pagelinks .
